## elementCSSBoxFeature variable

This feature enables receiving the CSS Box dimensions of an element identified by `tagName` in the `WebView` pixels unit. The first element matching the provided tagName is retained. A new event will be triggered on every resize.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
elementCSSBoxFeature: EventFeatureOf<ElementCSSBoxDimensionsOptions, typeof eventHandlerName, ElementCSSBoxDimensions>
```
